description: This table extracts the authorization source information table for temporary charge transactions.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge session record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUTH_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the authentication record linkage source type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


System


Charge Router Handler
